website_summaries.verdict: Best value package  for iPhone 6 models.
pros: Includes tape and cloth to remove dust before application
cons: Won't cover the rounded edges of many new smartphones

customer_reviews.title: Easiest screen protector install ever
customer_reviews.text: I hate installing/applying screen protectors. Regardless of how carefully I try to operate, there's inevitably some spec of dust under the protector or a bubble I can't smooth out. But this one was different. Completely. I followed the instructions and used the materials supplied, and I was pleasantly shocked that, when I laid the protector on top of my screen, it basically self-installed. No dust, no bubbles, nothing but a clear, clean screen. So far, I really like it. The screen image is crisp and clear, and it's not prone to getting fingerprints and smudges like the ones I've bought in the past. Would definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: CHUD_Champ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and remove and DOES ITS JOB!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to assume that it's a GOOD thing that my daughters and I used JETech Screen Protector for our iPhones and have had the experience of the screen doing its job--breaking instead of the screen itself. It's my understanding that the protector's tempered glass will sacrifice itself for the sake of the iPhone screen. On at least two occasions an iPhone has fallen onto the pavement and the screen protector is cracked--but the phone is fine! Meanwhile, the JETech Screen Protector doesn't scratch or get as greasy/filmy as others I've used. As long as you take your time while applying the cover (and removing it when necessary), it's easy to apply and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Ellamama

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to place on phone.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my iPhone 6. The packaging for these protectors is great. Not the flimsy cardboard most come in this is a hallowed out thicker box style which keeps the proctecors from wear prior to arrival/phone placement. Inside the box comes with instructions, cleaning cloth and sticker as well as guide stickers for easy placement on our phone. This allows you to place down and I experienced zero bubbles underneath. Great buy and like that it comes with two protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift to myself and only installed it a few days ago. All I have to say is, it makes it look like I have a brand new phone. Feels that way too. Installation using the included instructions is a snap. It went so easy and the effect is just excellent. Super glossy and smooth, it literally makes it feel like my phone is brand new. Can't go wrong with this for the price of admission.
customer_reviews.author: S. OLEARY

customer_reviews.title: but very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a week, but very happy with it. Previously, I had the Zagg Glass protector, which was $35. Plus, as an idiot, I was convinced by the mobile store dude that I should have them put it on for $10 (A previously free service). Never again. This was $7 for two. I was able to attach the screen to my phone extremely easily, with zero bubbles. On top of that, I feel like it's way more clearer than the Zagg Glass protector. It's a little thicker than the Zagg, but nothing horrible. I am very happy I made this purchase instead of another Zagg.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk! Installation was easy enough, however, there was a piece of link stuck in between the phone and the screen protector, so I had to lift it up and reapply. Well, that was it, once you lift it up, that portion is no longer effective in sticking to the phone. So the entire 1/4 of the screen protector was ruined. I ended up throwing it away and using the second one and after installation, saw that the top corner was already chipped. So, let's see how long this screen protector will last.
customer_reviews.author: CookieMonster

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: First screen protector was defective, so I take it off and move onto the second. Immediately after putting it on it cracks! Awful product. I deserve a refund, but how are you supposed to return two used screen protectors? Don't believe any of the 5 star reviews from people who received the screen protectors for their "fair and unbiased" review. BS!
customer_reviews.author: Ndk

customer_reviews.title: These are horrible screen protectors for the 6S
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom’s iPhone 6S because I had always had good luck applying jetTech screen protectors to my i6 and i8. With my mom’s phone, even after cleaning the screen completely and applying, I still got bubbles all the way down on the left side of the screen. So I tried it again, and it was the same result, bubbles all the way down the left side of the screen. I felt so bad so I bought her screen protectors from another vendor. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: lailari72

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: So I had a screen protector on my phone for YEARS. Never broke after dropping it a gazillion times. Finally it cracked. I purchased this to replace it. Wish I knew what I purchased the first time because this broke the first time I dropped my phone! What is even worse, I replaced the phone and accidentally re-ordered this same brand. My mistake, but when I put it on the new phone. it would not seal around the outer edges of the new phone. So then, I took it off, thinking it was defective. Replaced it with the second one. Same problem. Save your money and choose a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been a fan of screen protectors, plastic or glass. I read a review by our tech writer about how they’ve improved. He recommended JETech and I thought I’d try it for my old phone. I wish I had done it sooner. Very resistant to fingerprints, very durable yet very touch sensitive and no problems with swiping. Installation was a little tricky but this boomer did it by just following the instructions carefully. Got it perfect on the first try with no bubbles. I’ll definitely get another set when I upgrade my phone in a few weeks. Fast shipping as well with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Jones, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Just spend another 10$ for something that works
customer_reviews.text: These are about the same quality as the dollar store tempered glass. First off, they do not cover the whole screen. They have about 1/8” gap between the edge of your phone and the glass, so if you have a case that grips the edge prepare to clean lint and picket fuzz out of the gap CONSTANTLY. The real deal breaker is exactly how ineffective it is though. I dropped my phone from my lap to a flat concrete surface (maybe 3 feet) and it was destroyed. Not just the protector which would normally crack instead of the phone, but my actual screen as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: NOT a Perfect Fit IPHONE 6S, leaves parts of the glass exposed. Air bubbles on all four corners even after using a credit card.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back for a refund. Both screens would not fit perfectly protecting the screen. The shield is off by 1mm and leaves two long exposures on both sides of the phone which causes air bubbles all along the side of the phone. The are trapped air bubbles on all the corners of the phone even after using a credit card to smooth out the bubbles. Do not buy for I Phone 6s
customer_reviews.author: JAMES R. HAINER

customer_reviews.title: I AM IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This phone case changed my life. Not exaggerating. I tried a lifeproof case and it was horrible. No one could hear me on the phone and it made my photos horrible. It made a ticking sound it caused as I took video. I got this case on my daughter's suggestion. It was so inexpensive I doubted it would protect my phone. IT DOES. It is so pretty, made of great quality and is so affordable. I got a screen protected with it. I can see my screen and I am so pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: shopper1

customer_reviews.title: screen appearance
customer_reviews.text: I'm not especially happy with the appearance. I actually threw the first one away because it looked so bad. There were alot of spots that I could not clean. I do think they may have gotten onto the sticky back before I I got it onto the phone. It looked terrible so I took it off & threw it away & used the 2nd one. I followed the instructions exactly both times. The 2nd one is better with fewer spots but there are still tiny air bubbles under it that I can't remove. I'm afraid to keep trying for fear that it might get worse for trying.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Y’all I wish I would have taken before and after pics. I’ve bought these 2 times and I let my last one go for a year (I should have prolly replaced t a little sooner) but the tempered glass was SOOO CRACKED to the point where I actually thought my screen had cracked (I have a toddler mind u so it’s been dropped kicked to the moon) it’s been dropped screen down, thrown at the wall, etc.. but I took the old protector off and my phone legit is still looking brand new, no cracks, nothing. I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: The first one I tried to put on was difficult to get out air & bubbles. It looked terrible. So I tried the second one. It has three areas that wouldn’t clear out. Very dissatisfied!!!! I did everything correctly & worked so hard to get it perfect. Didn’t happen. Will live with these cloudy spots til I buy another screen cover from another company! The set was only $5.99, so I guess I got what I paid for!! Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money! Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product based on the good reviews I read. I bought 2 jtech protector screens for my iphone6 & 11. I had no problem with the installation per se as it is very east, you just have to follow the instructions. But one day, I found out that my iphone6 protector screen was damaged. I messaged jtech in hope to have a replacement & they didn’t let me down. They issued me a replacement right away without any further questions. So happy that I decided to get their product. Worth my money. Until now, I have no problem with the screens anymore. Thank you jtech for satisfying your customers. God bless you!
customer_reviews.author: MrsPinay

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and I had no problems. I have dropped my phone multiple times over the years and the screen has not been damaged. The previous protector had been on my phone for well over a year and had one small crack so I thought I’d replace it using the identical product. Literally the day I put it on, my phone slipped out of my pocket into the floor and my phone screen underneath the protector cracked. I’m so disappointed. I’m assuming there was a fault with the screen protector. Now I have to pay to get my screen replaced. I won’t be using these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel the mfr owes me money!
customer_reviews.text: In just 2 days, not only the Screen Protector cracked when dropped, but my iPhone screen cracked! No protection at all! I've had this particular iPhone6 for 4 years and dropped it hundreds of times in my bathroom. This protector offered no protection at all. My Phone screen is cracked worse than the picture of the screen protector. I wish I could attach a gppd photo of my actual phone. I used the 2nd protector in this package to hold my actual screen together until I can have it repaired. This was an expensive mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Hard Pass
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but you get what you pay for. The screen was very easy to install (they include a whole set up, but I found it easy to just apply by hand), but these did not last. The very first drop I had put a huge crack in it. Now, I understand that this is the exact purpose of a screen protector, but it should not break the first day I put it on after falling onto a rug from my lap.
customer_reviews.author: Caylie Dellerman

customer_reviews.title: These are so worth it, buy two packs!
customer_reviews.text: Solid screen protector for my iPhone 6s. I had to replace my battery and I decided to take the first one off and use the 2nd one it came with (total of 3). The original one I took off, I scratched really good with different types of keys 🔑 and also some sharp screw drivers, Not a scratch or mark on it lol I’m impressed and I know I can trust this phone in the same pocket as my keys. It’s durable, and definitely money well spent. I’ll be ordering another pack (:
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: A screen protector that doesn't protect the screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my iPhone 6s. I was using a Mophie case with it and I dropped it. The screen protector cracked, but I didn't see any significant cracks on the screen. I'm wondering now if there were cracks on the side because when I put the second screen protector on it and unfortunately dropped it a second time a couple of weeks later, both the screen protector and the screen completely shattered. I will never buy this product again. I'm now using an Otterbox Defender. They should offer some sort of warranty, like amFilm does. Replacing the glass is so damn expensive!!!
customer_reviews.author: AV207

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I was using on of their screen protectors and forgot I had it on it's that invisible. Then I somehow cracked the screen of my $1,200 iPhone and was sooo upset. Then I remembered my screen saver and thank God the crack was only on the saver part. I immediately bought another set so I always have on handy. Worked so good I bought my friend one that's always breaking her screen.
customer_reviews.author: Toni R

customer_reviews.title: Best User Friendly Ones I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I was genuinely surprised and happy with this entire "kit." I thought I was just buying a screen protector but this thing comes with a prep pad to clean your screen, a massive sticker to remove any last remaining bits of dust, and then two tab "handles" so you never have to touch the screen or the screen protector with your hands. The screen protector instantly made contact all the way across without any bubbles or dust bits. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: SweetestJamie

customer_reviews.title: I drop my phone as if it was drenched in butter
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, it's a sturdy product. I repurchased this item again after a few years because the cracks were beginning to collect a little bit of dirt (an insignificant amount to be honest). It amazingly absorbed any and all of the damage from several accidents. The best thing about this glass is that, although I could see the cracks from the damage while the screen was not in use (black screen), they were barely visible when I was using my phone. No distracting, obtrusive cracks while I'm reading. The box came with 2 protective screens, as well as 2 cleaning kits so you don't have to reuse a dirty one again.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I have used it before and it has protected my screen well. It would be easier to apply if they would only put adhesive on the ends of the hinges instead of the whole length. When you fold the screen back to peel the protective cover from the glass, the adhesive has a tendency to grab the sides of the phone and makes it hard to align the screen properly back on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Pastjoe

customer_reviews.title: As easy as the reviews make it out to be...
customer_reviews.text: Initially skeptical of the wording in the step-by-step instructions, I forged ahead. You're given two sticker tabs which you fasten to the underside of the phone. You place the glass film precisely down on the phone's face, seeing that it exactly matches up with the phone's home button and other landmark holes. Then you bend the stickers up and over to stick onto the glass film, so that, like the top cover of a book, it will always find the correct "home" position. If you do exactly what you're told to do, it works. No dust, no bubbles, it doesn't interfere with the case's "fit." Feels good.
customer_reviews.author: details 'R us

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: This cover was the highest rated on Amazon, so I figured it was safe. It arrived today and I installed it on 2 different Iphone 6 devices with the exact same results. The screen does NOT adhere properly around the edges. The screens were applied and lined up perfectly per the cut outs and directions supplied. Despite this, it will only be a matter of time before dust and grime get under the un-adhered portions and the screen starts to peel up. Clarity, finish, and durability are all excellent. However, if it is not even going to adhere to the phone properly all of those qualities are moot.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, easy install, priced right
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but this product deserves one. 1st the packaging is superb. Glass fits perfectly and if you follow the install directions it’s quite easy. This glass installed on the first try, I’m a little OCD and if it’s off a fraction I’m not happy. I can’t believe it came out perfect, better then 4yrs ago when I paid 30 dollars to someone at the mall to do this and it wasn’t perfectly aligned. The price of this item below what I think they deserve. Thank You JETech
customer_reviews.author: monte e hornung

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Looks beautiful on my phone. Barely noticeable. Only issue I have is how small the glass is relative to my phone. There’s tons of uncovered area around the edge. I would prefer it to completely cover the entire surface. But I still think it’s great. And the process to put it on (albeit trying at first) is great. More importantly, the results are great.
customer_reviews.author: seana

customer_reviews.title: The best I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I now have these on my iPhone and iPad. Make sure you follow the directions and watch the video. I have avoided screen covers for years because I can’t stand bubbles under them. These install easy and perfectly every time if you follow the directions. They feel great to the touch and you will forget it is even installed. They are also easy to clean. I will definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Code Seven

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply to my phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a replacement for my previous screen-protector - which did it's job, but the screen protector cracked so it was time to replace it. After removing the old protector, I used the included wipes and dust remover to clean everything off my phone screen, then peeled the sticker from the back, and used to two protector 'holding tabs' to align and apply the new screen protector. It went on smoothly and cleanup was a breeze. Once again, looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Scott  Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Screen protects itself, not the phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to protect my daughter's iPhone 6S and it failed miserably. The phone fell from waist high onto my daughters foot and then slid to the floor. The screen protector stayed in tact but the phone screen cracked under it. I have purchased other brands (Omoton, Tech Armor) of screen protectors before and in every occurrence of a fall, some being directly on a tile or concrete surface, the protective screen cracked and the phone screen was saved. This brand of protector is obviously designed to protect itself and not the phone screen. Very disappointed. Will not make that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: C. John

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful tempered glass screen protector! I aligned the openings perfectly with the appropriate areas on the iPhone 6s and the entire perimeter of the screen protector is lifting up 5 minutes later. It's almost as if the glass isn't big enough. There is also that annoying rainbow effect around the edges that is very distracting. I had such high hopes for this item. So very disappointed. What a complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: These protectors have saved my phone on more than one occasion. I’ve caught my phone on the edge of a granite countertop and it didn’t get a scratch. They last a really long time too. My last one lasted well over a year with many drops before I needed to replace it. I only wish they covered the edges a bit more, but with a proper case it’s no problem. I’ve bought these at least 3 different times and will continue to do so. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Whitmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This item is the easiest to apply, my husband dropped his phone , I thought the screen had cracked, it was the screen protector, if had not been for the screen protector, we would have had a cracked screen. I ordered a backup as we are older and things slipping out of our hands happens frequently. I truly like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protector, simple instructions, great packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The product was very simple to install and looks awesome. My old screen protector was all cracked, and at first, I thought it was my phone screen that was cracked. I was very happy when I removed the old screen protector and saw that my phone screen was perfectly fine. The instructions and tools that come with this package are very nice and very simply to use. The packaging was top notch and I have zero complaints about the product or its price. I'd happily buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy And Layna

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing issue??
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 6s iPhone. Description said would fit. Measured to make sure. It barely covered HALF of my screen!!!! For $6.95, as we are on stay at home quarantined orders not able to go return it, actually almost $13, for 2, It was packaged perfectly, no damage to box, but item was cut in half. Possibly an error at manufacturing??
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: they are pretty easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I used one protector for my phone, and one for my dad's phone. After a fall, my phone screen still cracked, along with the tempered glass screen protector. I also have a case on my phone at that time. My dad's phone screen did not crack, but his protector did. These might help with very very minor falls, but definitely does is not completely solid. However, if you follow the instructions, they are pretty easy to put on!
customer_reviews.author: WSC

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT LISTEN TO APPLICATION DIRECTIONS, PROTECTS PHONE👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I got this screen protector pack about 2 months ago, dropped my phone once, protector took ALL DAMAGE. Then I replaced it, dropped it again, and the screen took it again. (It sounds like I dropped my phone on purpose, I did not😂) However, this protector took the damage with help from my marble design ULAK case, which is a simple rubber layer with bumpers and a fitted plastic part on top. Note: do not put the protector on like it says on the manual, it’s incredibly complicated🙄 just hold your phone upside down, line it up with the home button, and swipe downwards to release the bubbles as you go. Definitely recommend, I’m ordering another pack right now.👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: The original package arrived empty.. it looked like the envelope had never been sealed. I contacted the JETech and they promptly sent out a replacement, which I greatly appreciated!!! Installation was super easy! This is my second replacement with this brand... it has done an exceptional job. The screen protector has cracked on the side... I know the first time was from a drop, not sure what caused it to crack the second time.. but regardless, I'm just happy it is the the screen protector that cracks and not my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality screen protector and moderate ease of applying with the included alcohol, cloth and sticky dust remover. No air bubbles remained. However, even though the screen itself is completely covered and protected, I wish the film extended further to the bottom and top of the iPhone instead of only about 2/3 down on the white borders of the phone face. The line is noticeable and appearance would be improved and look more finished if it covered a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: 2-day Protection Guarantee *eye roll*
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended this product by a friend. Note should be made that I take really good care of my phone. I had another tempered glass protector on my phone for over a year with no cracks or large noticeable scratches but a couple weeks ago I dropped it and got a healthy dent in it. I got this brand as a replacement and within two days, it had a crack in the screen down by the home button. Then yesterday, I pulled it out of my bag and there was another one at the top of the screen. Threw out the packaging with the lifetime card but to be honest would not buy or trust this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As others have indicated it installs smoother than some other brands in terms of avoiding large bubbles in the middle that can't be cleared. The positioning tabs and large dust removal sticker are a huge help. The edges on mine won't stick down even though the phone was cleaned appropriately and the protector centered appropriately over the screen. As others have indicated it would have been nice to have a wet cleaning cloth as well; IMO the microfiber cloth that comes in this package wasn't as good as others for cleaning bad smudges. Besides that, especially for the price, I'm glad I chose this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: The best screen protectors money can buy.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? These screen protectors are absolutely the best you can buy. I have used this brand on my past 3 phones, and have dropped one phone on a pointed rock and it scratched the screen protector, but phone was unharmed! I ordered again for an iphone 6s and it is perfect. I have peace of mind once the screen protector is installed.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Decreased touch sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to review so as to give the product a fair chance. After months of use, I have to say that the touch sensitivity is GREATLY reduced to a very noticeable point. It gets very frustrating when trying to move objects on the screen, when opening apps, playing games, basically anything that requires the use of a fingertip. Plus the width of the protector doesn't quite cover the entirety of the screen, even when positioned perfectly (I ordered the correct size). I'm considering removing and replacing, but I hate wasting money. Eventually I'll get frustrated enough, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C

customer_reviews.title: I use my phone as a cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I needed this protective covering because I really was damaging my last screen. I mean really damaging it. These phones are sturdy enough to slice fruit on and halving scrumptious sandwiches. What is life for except enjoying and getting the most out of life. Halving your scrumptious sandwiches on your phone is one of those little tidbits of joy that brightens my day with glee. Now that I have this protective tempered glass on my phone. I slice the living F out of S on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Accorsi

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I know why they sell in packs of two. They break on the first drop. I had a competitor screen protector on for 3 years, decided it was time for a refresh. I have broken 2 of these within a month. I am not rough in my phone. A chip crumb on the counter cracked one! They are VERY fragile. I now have to replace my refresh much sooner than anticipate. I’m giving 2 stars because they are very easy to install, but I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DianeS

customer_reviews.title: Works well no bubbles, thicker material, and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product, actually went on perfectly and no bubbles this time! It’s a thicker good quality, without the sharp edges I’ve read in other product reviews. However as I think others mentioned, it does not cover the entire phone/device, but only the screen that lights up. Came with wet & dry cleaning wipe plus a lint removal sticker & placement stickers for installation. Update 3/30 - dropped the phone screen down on ceramic tile today, the cover shattered but protected the screen with no damage:).!
customer_reviews.author: Awnik

customer_reviews.title: Get the Nearpow brand instead
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with product. Looked great at first but after a few days i noticed that the sides were not adhering and you can see a bubble along the edges. I have applied many other screen protectors on my own phones and those of friends and family so the installation was done properly. Never had this happen before. I used the nearpow brand on a friends phone and it still looks great after months. Wish i had used the Nearpow brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Works, easy to install, but shatters easily so keep the extras handy.
customer_reviews.text: It looked good on my phone, but then started to crack, then crack some more, then it was all cracks. It's way more fragile than the glass on my iPhone, and I'm glad it's there, but it's a bit quick to commit harakiri and seems to have broken from normal wear-and-tear, not any catastrophic drop or hits. Still... glad it's on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Foghorn Leghorn

customer_reviews.title: Protects iPhone screen
customer_reviews.text: It took me a couple of applications to get it right- the product is "kinda" forgiving.. I could peel it back off if I was careful to straighten it out completely. Saved my husbands screen from cracking when he dropped it about a week after I put it on his phone. Other than the learning curve to getting it right on the first try- which is a user error type thing, not a product thing.. I couldn't be happier with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector, especially for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to apply, clear images on my screen and no touch lag time. When I first applied it there were 5 tiny bubbles I couldn't get rid of, but by the next morning they were gone. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the left edge will not stick down completely and it's perfectly on the smooth surface (not over the rounded edge). The right side is fine. I smooth it down daily to make sure it doesn't come up and overall it's sticking fine. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: dkamper

customer_reviews.title: Installation for perfectionists
customer_reviews.text: When I read the instructions for putting on this screen protector, I thought, "FINALLY!" It's definitely an involved process but for those of us who are a little particular about getting our screen protectors lined up, this is a must. Though the instructions are lengthy, it's actually a really easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Easy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install. Nice that they include two complete kits in case you really mess up an installation or eventually the first one wears out. A little tough to get perfectly straight on the edges but really easy to get very close to it. Doesn't affect the functionality of the phone one bit and will keep the glass nice and clean for resale down the road. I can't speak to whether it offers and breakage protection if you were to drop the phone.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: Great directions, could not have been easier to apply. Fit perfectly and NO bubbles: once the screen protector made contact with the screen, it just started sticking from one side to another and in seconds it was on perfectly. With the last one (not this brand), I had to do a lot of pressing to eliminate the bubbles. And the holes/cutouts aligned perfectly with the phone. Glad I decided on this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Girl

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 packs with 2 screen protectors each. I do have to say that three have cracked at some point and I'm now on the fourth which already got a corner crack in the first week. So, it's an ok value for the price but these protectors are by no means bullet proof. They will protect your actual screen but they do not last too long themselves before it's time for the next one. I'm in my mid-40s and treat my phone like an adult, so the mediocre longevity of the protectors is not due to me throwing my phone around.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Regut

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector
customer_reviews.text: My last screen protector did it's job great. When I needed a new one I bought this brand. The only difference between my old screen protector and this one is what seems to be the need to press harder when texting or playing a game on my phone. It's not a big deal, just different.
customer_reviews.author: Kim-R

customer_reviews.title: High quality, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago and only used the one so far. It has lasted me two years! Now normal wear and tear and a few hard drops and face down it has protected my phone and now I will finally need to replace it with the second screen protector because the one I currently have on is cracked on the corner and a bit beat up but it did it’s job and protected my screen! I am beyond happy with these and will continue to buy them for my future phones. Great quality screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Chelbe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit iPhone 6s
customer_reviews.text: Protector does not cover the whole screen of my iPhone 6s. When I say it doesn't cover the whole screen, I'm not even referring to the entire front of my phone, just the black part of the front. What is the point of having the protector if it doesn't cover even that basic part of the phone? It leaves a rainbow glare at the edges, which would look pretty if it wasn't so bothersome. Additionally, one of the two protectors was full of bubbles when I put it one. This product was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUCH better alternative than spending $70 to have the guys at the mall install a tempered glass screen. The product comes with 2 complete packs to install the tempered glass screen. Each pack has the tempered glass, a cloth to clean off the screen prior to installation, and a sticky sheet to get off any stubborn dust that remains. Installation was easy, surprisingly easy. In fact, it looks better than when I had the pros at the mall install one. I haven't dropped the phone yet so I can't speak to how well it protects, but the quality seems top notch and the installation was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Almost full screen coverage
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, and came with extra lens and install packet. I work in a warehouse environment and take calls frequently, as well as pulling up prints and orders on my iPhone 6. The only negative is that is does not cover the entire edge. With my current phone case, it leave between 1/16" to 1/8" space all the way around. One great thing, is moisture (humidity and sweat) do not get behind the lens similar to an Otter Box.
customer_reviews.author: John g

customer_reviews.title: Good Screen Cover
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the cover. I have put it to the test a few times already without issue. I do have some minor scratches already but I am hard on things and probably was from sand. Installation was good but I am not a professional so my first attempt wasn't straight enough and when I realigned it a piece of dust found its way in so I had to used my second glass right away. No issue with the product just with my skill of installation.
customer_reviews.author: SRiha

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect, except it is a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: It's width is exactly equal to the width of iPhone 6S screen. I was able to allied it with accuracy of about 0.1 mm, but with 0.01 mm. Therefore, I have two small problems: 1) at the edge I have 0.1 mm rainbow because of the screen light interference on the edge. 2) sometimes it is difficult to type letters on this side of the screen. Thus it would be much better for me is the width of the screen would be about a bit wider than the size of the iPhone scree, may be by 0.2 or 0.5 mm.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the clearest screen protector I've ever used. The phones 3-D function works fine after the install. Just be careful when you position during installation. Once the protector is settled into place on the phones screen you will not be able to lift to adjust the position. Follow the instructions and all will be fine. Clear and bubble free. Take your time to make sure all dust is removed before you apply to your phone's screen.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector was easy to apply, and I liked the included cleaning kit. I placed the first one poorly and ended up using both right away, but that was user error. The protector is totally clear and there’s no touch interference. I’ve had it on for about 2.5 weeks now, however, and the protector is covered in scratches. I also set my phone face-down on my desk yesterday, no drops or anything, and now have a 1” crack across one corner of the protector. Unfortunately I didn’t register the warranty within 14 days, thinking I wouldn’t need it, so now my loss is their gain.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa E.

customer_reviews.title: Fits the phone and comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: For a do it yourself kit, this has everything. My complaint is that the glass was more fragile than other brands of tempered glass. Not by a ton but, enough to notice. These just don't last as long but, they do protect the screen from damage so no foul there. Just wish they were a little tougher. All that being said, at the price point, I will buy again and just change them more often.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bad Dad

customer_reviews.title: WOW. Great item!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! I dread putting these things on but they come with a cleaner, then a sticker like lint removal thing. And then they have tabs that you stick on top of the protector that easily allows you align it properly and place it perfectly on you phone! I have never put one of these things on this easily and have it look great. In fact I did two of them in less then 5 minutes. No lint. No air trapped under it. Perfectly aligned. Just order them! They are very thick and seem like they will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: ks2dice

customer_reviews.title: Oddly cracked less than 24 hrs after applying
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to go on fairly flawless. Fit was great. First attempt it went on straight & no bubbles. No drops, no bumps, yet oddly it's cracked. Only thing I would think is that it had a tiny flaw that I didn't see & it proceeded to advance. I'm hoping to speak with supplier about a replacement. I definitely don't want my hand to get cut from cracked glass. I'll update accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: SalesMarketingPro79

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install on phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these iPhone screen protectors for 2 different phones. The package includes all the supplies needed to clean the screen before installation. I found them easy to install. Just take your time when lining up the new screen protector on the phone to be sure it is lined up correctly. I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product multiple times, and the quality is consistently great. They include everything you need to apply the protector successfully. The cutouts for the camera and home button are accurate for the most part, compared to cheaper screen protectors. Screen feels natural and 3D Touch works perfectly. The only con would be that it does not cover the entire screen of the phone. There is a small portion (maybe 3mm wide) around the screen that is not covered. Overall, good product. Protects your phone like it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and a breeze to apply, even for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very simple to install if you get it lined up correctly. Make sure you've cleaned the surface VERY well, then apply, top first, and lay it down lightly onto the bottom. If you've done it correctly, you will see the glass adhere in a slow moving "wave" across the phone from top to bottom, effectively leaving ZERO air pockets sing the way. Once it's on, go over it with a microfiber (or similar) to really seal it down. Totally recommend buying this item to protect your iPhone. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Big Bad Dana

customer_reviews.title: My black phone is even worse because it's black and the edges are very annoying ...
customer_reviews.text: False advertised. I bought 6 of these screen protectors for 4 of my iphone 6s. They're not compatible at all, The edges of the protector do not stick down all the way no matter how hard you try. Here's a picture of my dad's white phone, look at the edges. My black phone is even worse because it's black and the edges are very annoying cause it's clear white. I would like to believe this is a good product for iphone 6 due to all the great reviews, but them saying it works well for the iPhone 6s also is a lie!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Fok

customer_reviews.title: Just in time
customer_reviews.text: I recently got my daughters 6S repaired and wanted to quick get something for the screen before we had an accident. not a moment too soon, this weekend we discovered the screen was cracked, but was it? no, it turns out these protectors that I had just finished putting on her phone took the brunt of the damage and I have a second to replace the one that was sacrificed. Good value and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not over the entire screen.
customer_reviews.text: I have an Apple iPhone 6, it does not cover the entire phone! There is still a good bit of space all the way around my phone. My phone fell out of my vehicle and the protective glass and my actual glass both broke. What’s the point of this if it doesn’t cover the whole screen?
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wool

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The installation instructions were pretty vague, but after watching a youtube.com installation it was a breeze. The shipping was fast and efficient. The anti-glare and install work fine, I haven't had the product long enough to attest to the scratch resistant rating. Looks like a winner to me.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon M. Barron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and a Bargain to Boot!
customer_reviews.text: These were really easy to install, and they look great! It’s a clever installation design that has you creating a sort of hinge with removeable stickers. Everything you need to install the screen protector without actually touching it or leaving dust on the surface come with the kit. No big bubbles are left trapped, and the glass lines up just right because of the “hinges.” I paid $5.99 for these two screen protectors for my kids’ phones after they cracked the more expensive ones from the mall. You can’t beat this price, and I’m very happy with the product quality.
customer_reviews.author: karatemama

customer_reviews.title: As long as you follow the instructions, covers are easy to place.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture and i wore gloves just in case so i wouldnt leave fingerprints while placing screen cover. Ive dropped my phone a LOT, so these covers will save my screen big time. Not a bad deal for two considering places charge $5 or more for one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector! Had for two years and finally broke when I dropped it on an escalator. Completely protected the screen of my 6s. Would have been really upset if my 6s broke because no reason to upgrade to the 7 or 8 which are the same. Bought a replacement and really like the fact that the product hasn't changed in 2 years. They still give you two screen protectors and the microfiber cloth.
customer_reviews.author: alinktothefuture

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This screen saver is nice. It feels like the original glass on my iPhone. Easy to put on, the instructions and supplies that came with it are great. And there are two in the box - great deal. Doesn't cover the entire screen, the edges are not covered, but with a case it's fine for me. Nothing touches the edges anyway. You can tell the screen protector is there. But I really like it - easy to put on, no bubbles, nice feel when using, and will protect my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Never sealed around edges
customer_reviews.text: I was 0-for-2 with these screen covers. Both of them failed to adhere to the screen around the edges. More than 50% of the edge had visible air underneath - for both screens. I worked really hard to clean the screen from any previous grime and ensure that no dust was on the screen or cover. But they still didn't seal. I'm disappointed because I specifically bought this since the product claims to work for an iPhone 6 (which is what I installed them on). Oh well, I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Best Tempered Glass Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these screen protectors. I have had cheap cases on my phone with the security that these covers will help and they have. I have ordered them several times because I will drop my phone, there will be a crack in the cover and I easily remove and replace with a new protector. I am so shocked at how affordable but effective they are. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Skye Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Good value but you lose screen protection
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the easiest screen protectors i’ve ever put on but, it doesn't fully cover the screen. By that i mean the actual touch screen part of the phone. It leaves way too much screen uncovered for a phone cover that i’m not sure I can trust the protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen protector
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector was easy to install and looked great. Didn't have any difficulty with air bubbles. Dropped my phone and the screen was fine. The screen lasted me about 1 year and a half before I decided to replace it since it does come with two. It slight lifted from one corner, but lasted a long time and did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, hard to get off of the paper and put on phone.
customer_reviews.text: These protectors are pretty good. They are a pain to put on your screen though because you need to make sure all of the air bubbles are gone and it was difficult to peel them off. I ended up still having a bubble at the end of my phone and it eventually received a crack on the protector, but the phone itself didn’t crack so the protection is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Powers

customer_reviews.title: Did not work this time
customer_reviews.text: The first screen protector protected my phone when a rock hit against it. So I installed the 2nd one, and this time it did not do anything to protect my phone against a fall, along with having a heavy duty case on it. My phone screen completely cracked underneath this screen protector. Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fry

customer_reviews.title: I like them, especially for the price, but I just have to replace them too often.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars out of five because they are a good price but they're just so easy to break. I have to replace them very often. I am just going to assume that my phone screen would have broken if I didn't have a tempered protector on it, hence a decent score.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Cape

customer_reviews.title: Happy and worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: The last screen protector I had was from Verizon. Idk the name it was also temper glass but it was so old I just needed a new one. For this price this protector is amazing. Gets the job done. Easy to put on. Deff is temper glass. Only thing I wish is that it covered the whole phone, not just the screen. I have the white iPhone 6s so I wish the white parts where covered by the protector also! Or if they had the temper glass that's also a security screen that would be clutch. I love that 2 screen protectors sets(wipe and protector) come in a case. Cute box too. Overall I'm satisified.
customer_reviews.author: yoyoxo

customer_reviews.title: It was incredibly easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: First time buying tempered glass for my phone, and I was totally blown away by the quality of the kit I was sent. It was incredibly easy to apply, and turned out looking awesome. It doesn't cover the phone entirely, so keep that in mind. Not sure why? But I haven't had an issue with it yet, and it hasn't seemed like it's an issue. I can't even tell it's on the screen any more, to be honest. Feels just like the real screen! Would totally recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work great for me
customer_reviews.text: I easily installed this but within weeks the edges seem to start to come up. I thought maybe it was something I did wrong so I cleaned the phone and made sure it was dry and tried the second one. Within weeks the edges were bubbling up again.
customer_reviews.author: kathysgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: Put my phone in my mouth to hold it and CRUNCH! Screen protector broke. If the screen protector cannot handle that every so slight pressure from my teeth how exactly is it going to protect the glass under it? My first time buying a screen protector and I’m not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Lacking quality control
customer_reviews.text: Hair stuck in the sticky side before I even pulled off the tape to apply. The screens had a lot of dust on the non sticky side and I cleaned up most of it but couldn’t get the dust on the sticky side. This happened on both screens, never had this issue before. Will purchase another brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to apply but I got it on with no problem- or bubbles under the surface. It’s just a tiny bit (approximately 1 mm) smaller than the glass surface of the iPhone 6S but still provides adequate protection. There were two screens in the package and so definitely good value.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Good product, could last longer
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about three and a half months. Easy to put on, instructions were clear and provided materials made dust-free application easy. Then a bubble started to appear in one of the corners and grew and grew and grew. A little annoying but not a big deal. Put the second one on, but was hoping to not have to do that for at least a year or so. Otherwise it's a solid product. Durable glass, has protected my screen from a few scratches over the last six months, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: KRK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing... Just Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I did a drop/throw on concrete trying to show my wife something while standing in line on black Friday. The phone bounced and actually heard the people behind me cringe. It landed face down, but only received a minor crack in the protector. The phone screen was unharmed. I think Amazon needs an express button for these things because I tend to drop my phone often.
customer_reviews.author: richard Waider

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector saved my phone
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my phone several times and during a trip I dropped it again on the rock and it looked like the screen was broken. After I peeled the protector off, lucky me, it's only the protector but not the screen itself. I can not be more happier. Bought another one and recommended to my friends. BTW, I got the first one broken in the middle by itself after several weeks after I put it on my phone, after contacting the seller, they sent me a replacement right after. Good service too.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Roaster in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: 6s version is too wide
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my other JETech 6s plus protector worked great, so I figured the 6s version would be just as good. No, it's not good. Turns out the width of the protector is too wide, so it overlays into the curved sides of the phone and leaves a messy looking peeled up look on both sides. The center is fine. The installation process is easy and great, it just doesn't fit a 6s very well due to the width. Skip this one for 6s.
customer_reviews.author: OfficeSpace

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite cheap screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I am always trying different brands of cheap screen protectors. These are like most for the price. No matter how perfectly you apply this, it will not seal tightly at one edge or another. Only two stars for this set because the application procedure is lousy. You are supposed to put stickers on it yourself to grasp while you lower it onto the phone. Other inexpensive screen protectors include a little plastic tray to help with perfect alignment.
customer_reviews.author: ride

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one on my phone for 3 months now. I dropped it a few times and never had issues, but today I dropped it really hard on the tile floor in the kitchen at work. Everyone was asking if I broke my phone but I knew it was fine lol. When I got home I noticed cracks in the screen protector but the screen was fine. Just ordered another pack. When you apply it, follow the instructions carefully and make sure the screen is clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and easy-to-use product
customer_reviews.text: Installing a screen protector on your phone is always so difficult, but this product makes it almost foolproof. Easy to follow instructions and a few minutes later I had a perfectly situated (and bubble & dust free) screen protector on my phone. This seller also has great customer service. The first item I purchased was shipped quickly but got lost somewhere along the way, and when I contacted the seller for a resolution I received a prompt email back apologizing and asking me if I'd like a refund or a replacement. I opted for the replacement, and received a new one within days. Really great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Alley

product_meta.title: JETech Screen Protector for Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6s, 4.7-Inch, Tempered Glass Film, 2-Pack
feature_bullets: Note: due to the round edge of iPhone 6/6s, the glass screen protector won't cover 100% of the screen, but all the FLAT area. 2-Pack, [3D Touch Compatible]. Designed for iPhone 6s (2015 Model) and iPhone 6 (2014 Model) 4.7"

Made with high quality 0.33mm thick premium tempered glass with rounded edges exclusively for iPhone 6/6s 4.7. Fits iPhone 6 and iPhone 6s new model released on 2015. Extremely high hardness: resists scratches up to 9H (harder than a knife)
Dust-free, fingerprint-free, one-push super easy installation, bubble free
Retail package includes: 2-Pack tempered glass screen protectors, cleaning cloth, guide stick, dust removal stick, instructions, customer service card

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars37,251 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
